description: Look around your house and create variables for four items.
Create your own person object, that includes first name, last name, gender, and age.
Create a function that capitalizes the first letter of a string and lowercases the rest.
Create a mongoDB for movies that has at least three documents in the collection. Create an express API that includes a GET all, GET one by id, POST, and PATCH request.
Design a database (any) for a Pizza company. Add at least 3 pizzas, and at least 2 customers, at least 3 orders. Write code to connect to the database, get all and console.table results.
Create a function that returns the number of vowels in a given string.
Write a FOR loop that outputs 'I will never give up' ten times.
Create a function in ES6 syntax that takes an arguement and console.log's it.
In a group of 3-4. build and deploy an API, connect to the database of your choice and write a GET and POST endpoint. If you have time, do full CRUD.
Create a firestore database for events that has at least three documents in the collection. Create an express API that includes a GET and POST request.
